type.name: standard
type.summary:
Renko Chart is a modified Japanese candlestick pattern that uses time-lapsed bricks.
See documentation for more information.
type.typeparam: Configurable Quote type. See Guide for more information.
type.returns: Time series of Renko Chart candlestick values.

type.name: atr
type.summary:
The ATR Renko Chart is a modified Japanese candlestick pattern based on Average True Range brick size.
See documentation for more information.
type.typeparam: Configurable Quote type. See Guide for more information.
type.param: Lookback periods for the ATR evaluation.
type.returns: Time series of Renko Chart candlestick values.
